name: You're Probably Alone
description:
Well I tried my best to make a game within a week, but really I think I only had less than 48 hours to make this. I had only used Unity for about a week before Brackeys Game Jam and some old C++ knowledge from about five years ago.

I had to submit a day early before I go away.  I had no time to polish or improve graphics, transitions, menu's, proper enemy movement, animations or sound.

But I made...... Something! It's my first game ever and I am happy

Set inside the mind of the player, defeat those negative emotions and fight the final boss

Thank you for playing
